plugin.name: Readme
plugin.description: Please note that the default balance is to reflect a tit-for-tat balance, best suited for Warfare. If you are a story or freeplay player, you may want to use the optional modules to maintain a closer-to-vanilla balance (where some factions are outright stronger in online combat, regardless of rank). The optional modules are not recommended for Warfare.

plugin.name: BaS Support / Patch (WIP)
plugin.description: Adds BaS weapons to the various NPC loadouts.

plugin.name: Improved Army NPC Loadouts
plugin.description: Gives Army NPCs somewhat loadouts, with access to old AK74us & no more access to surplus SVT & SKS weapons, and better from Novice and up. End result is in making even novices a considerable threat in online combat. Does not affect offline combat.

plugin.name: Advanced Army Loadouts
plugin.description: Gives Army NPCs even stronger loadouts, with access to AK74s and better from Novice and up, making them a serious threat in online combat. Does not affect offline combat.

plugin.name: BaS Support - Advanced Army Loadouts
plugin.description: Use this for more advanced BaS weapon distribution (in line with the 'Advanced Army' loadouts).

plugin.name: Advanced Monolith Loadouts
plugin.description: Makes Monolith considerably more challenging in online combat - Monolith have access to a wider variety of weapons, including higher tier firearms, throughout all tiers. No surplus firearms, and even novices are reasonably well equipped. None shall reach the heart of the zone.

plugin.name: Advanced Merc Loadouts
plugin.description: Makes Mercs considerably more challenging in online combat - Mercs have access to a wider variety of weapons, including higher tier firearms, throughout all tiers. No surplus firearms, and even novices are reasonably well equipped.

plugin.name: Advanced Ecologist Loadouts
plugin.description: Makes Ecologists considerably more challenging in online combat - Ecologists have access to a wider variety of weapons, including higher tier firearms, throughout all tiers. No surplus firearms, and even novices are reasonably well equipped.
